rdf:Description.dc:title: Employing a diverse workforce : making it work 2008 making it work.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Employment and Immigration.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta : Alberta Employment and Immigration,
rdf:Description.dc:description: "Small to medium size business owners and managers in Alberta share tips for recruiting and retaining employees during a time of intense economic growth".
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Diversity in the workplace
Foreign workers
Employment in foreign countries.
Labor supply
Personnel management
